attributes.action: Demand our MP’s vote the way their Constituents Voted.
attributes.background: After the referendum our MP’s have been ignoring what there constituents voted for and have only towed party lines and the whip. These MP’s should be held accountable to vote as there constituents voted or we need a general election to deselect them.

rejection.details:
How an MP votes would be an individual decision for that person, and not a decision for the Government or Parliament as a whole.

You could ask your own MP to vote according to the result of referendum in your constituency. You can find out who your MP is and how to contact them here: 

https://www.parliament.uk/mps-lords-and-offices/mps/
